Name: ManagedMissingValuesRepresentationName
Description: A name for the missing value. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the managed representation. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the managed representation. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: MissingCodeRepresentation
Description: In-line description of a CodeRepresentationBase created for the purpose of capturing missing values with associated labels.

Name: MissingNumericRepresentation
Description: In-line description of a NumericRepresentationBase created for the purpose of capturing missing values as a set of numbers or a range.

Name: MissingTextRepresentation
Description: In-line description of a TextRepresentationBase created for the purpose of capturing missing values as text content.

Name: ProcessingInstructionReference_GenerationInstruction
Description: An optional reference to a GenerationInstruction describing how to generate the value for this representation when used as a response domain or missing value representation.

Name: ProcessingInstructionReference_GeneralInstruction
Description: An optional reference to a GenerationInstruction describing how to generate the value for this representation when used as a response domain or missing value representation.

Name: IsBlankMissingValue
Description: Designates no response (white space, null) to be treated as a missing value.
